title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Health) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister health) order 2023

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Susan Mitchell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Susan Mitchell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Health with effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 susan mitchell particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser minister health effect 17 december 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Páraic Gallagher, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Páraic Gallagher, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
the Minister for Health with effect from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 May, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [231] 3
text_norm: 3 paraic gallagher particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser minister health effect 17 december 2022 given official seal government 4 may 2023 leo varadkar taoiseach notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th may 2023 231 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint Special Advisers to Minister for Health, 
at the Department of Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [231]
